ARABIC: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So We rescued him and those with him in the loaded ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We delivered him and those with him in the loaded ark,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereafter We rescued him and those who were with him in the laden Ark
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We saved him and those who were with him in a fully laden Ark,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So We saved him and those with him in a laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We delivered him and those with him in the laden ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We delivered him, and those with him, in the laden ship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We saved him, and those who were with him in the laden ark,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore We delivered him and those with him in the laden ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereupon We delivered him and those who were with him in the laden ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We delivered him and those with him, in the Ark filled (with all creatures).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We saved him and those who were with him in the laden ship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We delivered him and those with him in the laden Ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:119] He, exalted be He, says: So We delivered him and those who were with him in the laden ark, [the ship] filled with humans, animals and birds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We saved him and those with him) among the believers (in the laden ship) and it was only waiting to sail away.
